title: The Ampersand is My Favorite Character
content:
I am very in love with the ampersand. It is my favorite character.  
For a long time I loved the lowercase 'g' and then the lowercase 'j.' There was a brief period when I was all about the interrobang but that was short-lived.  
Does anyone else love the ampersand?
author: Cole

comments.content: It's one of my favourites, too. I also like lc g and a.

I've never been a fan of the 'l.' I find it very frustrating to kern and the lowercase 'l' bothers me. A script L can be lovely.  
edit: removed dead link

I love things that need a designer's help to improve, and since most ampersands are flawed, I do indeed love it.

The "el" is the village idiot of the Latin alphabet - it needs a brain transplant.

hhp
